; format:

;
; name is really not used and is just for our reference.
;
; straight rail, straight street
rot0=0x02000200,0x00020002,0x05010100,1,0
rot1=0x00020002,0x02000200,0x05010100,0,0
;
; diagonal rail, straight street
rot0flip0=0x00000301,0x02000200,0x05010200,0,1
rot1flip0=0x00030100,0x00020002,0x05010200,3,1
rot2flip0=0x03010000,0x02000200,0x05010200,2,1
rot3flip0=0x01000003,0x00020002,0x05010200,1,1
rot0flip1=0x00030100,0x02000200,0x05010200,0,0

TYPE4=0x01000000,0x00010100,0x5d302000,1,0
